director.name: 奥兰多·科拉迪 Orlando Corradi

trans_title: 劳拉的星星 第三季
introduction: The popular pre-schooler series "Laura's Star" is now in its third season, and youngsters can look forward to fun new episodes with Laura and her special friend, a little star. Laura continues to forge ahead in life, making mistakes, winning battles, overcoming insecurity. As in the previous seasons, Laura gives youngsters an example of realistic behavior they can identify with.
chinese_title: 劳拉的星星 第三季
